text: Anthony James Gregor (April 2, 1929 - August 30, 2019) was an American educator, historian and political scientist. He was the Professor of Political Science Emeritus at the University of California, Berkeley who was well known for his research on fascism, Marxism, and national security. Gregor was born in New York City. Gregor died on August 30, 2019 at the age of 90. https://www.ilprimatonazionale.it/cronaca/morto-storico-a-james-gregor-128960/ ==References== ==Other websites== * Annotated bibliography – 1954 through 1998 * ResearchGate profile – With bibliography from 1961 through 2018 Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American historians Category:American political scientists Category:Educators from New York City Category:American political writers Category:Writers from New York City
title: A. James Gregor
